name: Retro Game/Pixelization Shader for Unreal Engine 4
name_original: Retro Game/Pixelization Shader for Unreal Engine 4
description:
Retro Game Inspired Pixel Shader for your Unreal Engine 4 Project!

Comes with a Master, 3 Presets (Ps1, N64 and Dos) Plus Demo Instance 

Easy to Customize, Super Low Impact and Pairs REALLY well with my Cel Shader kit! (See Screen Shots)
